name: RecordSubscriberState
description:
Record a subscriber's state for a marketing event using email.

This tool records the subscriber state of a HubSpot contact in relation to a specific marketing event using the contact's email. Note: the contact must already exist in HubSpot.

parameters.name: external_account_id
parameters.description: The account ID linked to the marketing event in the external application, required for identifying events.

value_schema.description: The accountId that is associated with this marketing event in the external event application

parameters.name: marketing_event_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event in the external application. Required to record subscriber state.

value_schema.description: The id of the marketing event in the external event application

parameters.name: subscriber_state
parameters.description: The new subscriber state for a HubSpot contact in the specified marketing event. Options include 'register', 'attend', or 'cancel'.

value_schema.description: The new subscriber state for the HubSpot contacts and the specified marketing event. For example: 'register', 'attend' or 'cancel'.

parameters.name: marketing_event_details
parameters.description: A list of details including contact email, properties, and timestamp for marketing event subscription updates.

email.description: The email address of the contact in HubSpot to associate with the event.

interactionDateTime.description: Timestamp in milliseconds at which the contact subscribed to the event.

inputs.description: List of marketing event details to create or update

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

parameters.name: externalAccountId
parameters.description: The accountId that is associated with this marketing event in the external event application

value_schema.description: The accountId that is associated with this marketing event in the external event application

parameters.name: externalEventId
parameters.description: The id of the marketing event in the external event application

value_schema.description: The id of the marketing event in the external event application

parameters.name: subscriberState
parameters.description: The new subscriber state for the HubSpot contacts and the specified marketing event. For example: 'register', 'attend' or 'cancel'.

value_schema.description: The new subscriber state for the HubSpot contacts and the specified marketing event. For example: 'register', 'attend' or 'cancel'.

email.description: The email address of the contact in HubSpot to associate with the event.

interactionDateTime.description: Timestamp in milliseconds at which the contact subscribed to the event.

inputs.description: List of marketing event details to create or update

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
